title.value: Effectiveness fertilizers in combination with irrigation of legume-gereal grass mixtures in the north-east of Belarus
Эффективность удобрений в сочетании с орошением бобово-злаковой травосмеси в условиях северо-востока Беларуси

journal.title: Land Reclamation : scientific and practical journal

person.name: Kholdeev, S.I., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: The results of three-year study on the effect of fertilizers in combination with irrigation on legume-cereal plant were presented in the conditions of the north-eastern part of the Republic of Belarus. The experimental grass mixture contained the following crops: meadow clover (Trifolium pratense L.) (35%); alfalfa (Medicago sativa) (40%); meadow fescue (Festuca pratensis) (35%); and timothy grass (Phleum pratense) (40%)). Research results showed that application of macro- and microfertilizers and a plant growth regulator in combination with irrigation provided higher productivity of the grass mixture which in course of three years was at the level of 75.5-123.1 centner /ha of dry matter. It was revealed that in the optimization of water supply for irrigation of grass by fertilizer use efficiency increased by 48,8-58,8%. The greatest productivity on average for the three years at two harvests use grass mixture was showed under irrigation on a background of supply P90K135 with complex micro fertilizers and growth regulators, and was 97.9 center / ha of dry matter.
